overview: A short Film Noir project directed by 17 yr old media student, Taijan Dean starring Rebel and Sarah Dean.  The Gilded Cage features a hard-boiled Private Investigator on the case to find some information for his confidential client, however, the case ultimately takes him to a grand and luxurious mansion where he finds himself face to face with the mysterious, femme fatale - wife of the mansion's owner. As their interview plays out, he soon finds there's a very dark game at play and that even the prettiest birds get tired of their Gilded Cages.
tagline: Even the prettiest birds get tired of their Gilded Cages.
title: The Gilded Cage
